discourse_list.title: Signalling Conversation underway in a different thread

content.content: Please be aware that I started an active signaling conversation in the Process Improvement thread. My apologies, I should’ve started it here.     Governance Voting Concept Process Improvement       Governance Voting Concept Why?  I feel Ethereum desperately needs an agreed decision making process before the next difficult decisions occur. Has to be something we can implement now, using existing technology. Has to be public and fair (though that is very relative). Barriers of entry must be low and fair but not nothing. . This paper puts forth the concept for discussion. It is not a complete system with all the rules needed. If there is enthusiasm, it could be quickly matured. This concept i…
